participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, with a strong connection to his rural lifestyle.
participant_1.background: i've a pet cow. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i work my parents farms.

participant_2.name: Emily

participant_2.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars.
